product_name: Yurbuds Focus Limited Edition Behind-the-Ear Earbuds
long_description: Let deep base set your pace with the Yurbuds Limited Edition behind-the-ear earbuds. The sweat- and water-resistant headphones lock in to your ears comfortably and stay in place while you work out. Switch between noise-isolating and ambient-sound options to personalize your listening based on your environment. Tangle-free Kevlar(R) cord features a 3-button panel and microphone that control music and phone calls on your iPod, iPad or iPhone.
short_description: Let deep base set your pace with the Yurbuds Limited Edition behind-the-ear earbuds. The sweat- and water-resistant headphones lock in to your ears comfortably and stay in place while you work out.
